title: Language Proficiency Improvement Education Using e-Portfolios and Social Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone utilization skills and proficiency in SNS usage
context.additional_context: Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments (Most Learners Lack PCs), Motivating Language Learning and Sustaining Participation Through Social Network-Based E-Portfolio Construction

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can upload and share at least three language learning materials per week via a social network-based e-portfolio
Learners can write and incorporate feedback into at least three self-reflection reports using materials collected in their e-portfolios
Learners can perform language exchange activities with peer learners at least twice monthly using social network collaboration features

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
